events.name: Project Clean Plate
events.description: We reward people who don't waste food with prizes or raffle tickets in Morgan POD.

events.name: Sustainability Pledge
events.description: We have people sign a pledge to be more sustainable, hopefully encouraging them to take specific actions.

events.name: Waste Audit
events.description: We sort through the trash of several buildings to determine the recycling rates and commonly disposed items.

events.name: Lighting Fair
events.description: We work with a provider to sell LED lights on campus.

events.name: Recyclemania
events.description: We compete against other colleges to see which one recycles better - involves fun games and events.

events.name: EarthFest
events.description: We celebrate Earth Day with many environmental themed events, normally bringing out our bike blender.

events.name: E-Waste Drive
events.description: We collect e-waste from the WPI community and send it off to a provider to properly have it recycled.
